Name: Stars & Stripes Shot
Ingredients: 15 ml Joseph Cartron Double Crème de Cassis de Bourgogne
15 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
Instructions: LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring ingredients in the order listed.
Review: The taste is too sweet and the colours aren't quite right. A shame.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock's 1930 Savoy Cocktail Book.
